evidence.title: Short Seller Jim Chanos Calls Elon Musk's Orbital Datacenter Goals 'AI Snake Oil' â€” Says Need To See 'Actual' Savings
evidence.summary: Criticism from a notable short seller may dampen investor sentiment towards Tesla's ambitious projects.

key_points: Short seller criticizes Elon Musk's vision for orbital datacenters.
Expected higher costs for space-based datacenters.
raw.why_it_moves: Criticism from a notable short seller may dampen investor sentiment towards Tesla's ambitious projects.
